channel.title: Can anyone make servers on a mac? I will reward anyone who is willing to help
channel.description: Hi, I need someone who has expierence and knows how to create a server on my mac. I know its a lot difficult and harder than windows. So i have team viewer and i know which source i want. My skype is tom.holt41. There will be a reward. Thanks!

item.title: Can anyone make servers on a mac? I will reward anyone who is willing to help
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:

Rule 8: We do not sell anything on this site, period. This includes offering 'rewards' for donations or anything like that. Furthermore, all requests of price or value for any property related to the game RuneScape is disallowed on these boards. This rule exists to prevent scamming, dishonest trading, and legal liability regarding the exchange of Jagex property. We do not encourage people to buy or sell anything related to RuneScape, Jagex, or any of their games.
